title: Dead Girl Walking
description: I am so dead...Now, was I supposed to go left or right at the Light?Seventeen-year-old Amber Borden has a lousy sense of directionâ€”so lousy that she takes a wrong turn when returning from her near-death experience. She ends up in the body of the most popular girl in school, who has just tried to commit suicide.Can a girl who can't even navigate the halls of Halsey High discover the secrets of her new identity and find her way back to her own life?
author: Linda Joy Singleton
